title: Exposure Of Admin Username & Password
steps: Press CTRL+U to view the source code of the page and look for the code snippet containing the credentials
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves the exposure of admin username and password in the source code of a webpage. The credentials are hardcoded in JavaScript and can be easily viewed by inspecting the page source. The password is stored as an MD5 hash, which can be decrypted to reveal the plaintext password.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it only requires viewing the page source, which is a common practice in security testing. The credentials are hardcoded and visible without any need for complex interactions or manipulations of the application state.
